properties.verseOrder: c1 c2 v1 c2 v2 c2 v3 c2 v4 c2 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Stutiyinchu priyudaa sadaa yesuni O priyudaa sadaa yesuni{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Narakamu nundi nanu rakshinchi Paralokomulo cherchu konnaadu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Saarvathri kaadhikari yesu Naa rakshana kai niru peda yaaye{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Paapa dandana bhayamunu baapi Paramaanandamu mana kosagenu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mana priya yesu vachchu chunnaadu Mahima shareeramu manakosagunu{/lang-eng}
